Requested asynchronous responses
These callbacks are asynchronously called as responses to previously put requests.

virtual void OnActivateCompleted (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause)
virtual void OnAuthenticateCompleted (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause)

Unsolicited asynchronous indications
These callbacks are asynchronously called either by the network or by another process (ATC) to indicate certain events.

virtual void OnActivationStatusContextIndication ()
virtual void OnDeactivateIndication (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause, PdpContext::Origin origin=PdpContext::UnknownOrigin)
virtual void OnReactivateIndication ()

Friends

class PdpContextManager

Detailed Description

This class contains the callback routines called upon arrival of signals dedicated to the associated PDP context.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PdpContextControl::PdpContextControl (   )  [inline]
 

virtual PdpContextControl::~PdpContextControl (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

Member Function Documentation

PdpContext* PdpContextControl::GetContext (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the PDP context that this context control is attached to. If it is currently not attached, then 0 is returned.

virtual void PdpContextControl::OnActivateCompleted (  PdpContext::ErrorCause  cause  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack response of previously submitted PdpContext::Activate(). If activation was triggered using a PPP frame, then the context's internal PPP frame represents the PPP frame returned by the stack, otherwise the context's internal PPP frame is empty.

virtual void PdpContextControl::OnActivationStatusContextIndication (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack indication of an unsolicited context activation status event.

virtual void PdpContextControl::OnAuthenticateCompleted (  PdpContext::ErrorCause  cause  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack response of previously submitted PdpContext::Authenticate().
